caption.p: Effect of methanol fruit extract of Tetrapleura tetraptera on mitochondrial membrane potential of astrocytes. Each bar is expressed as mean Â± SD (n = 3). #p < 0.05 vs normoxia; * p < 0.05 vs anoxia. TT: Methanol fruit extract of Tetrapleura tetraptera. Red stain (polarized J-aggregates form) indicated high mitochondria membrane potential while green fluorescence (monomer form) indicates depolarized (low) mitochondrial membranes. Few/loss of red stain indicated low mitochondria membrane potential.
